channel.title: Dementhium 639 HD/Zaros Boss Perfect Non Mysql Updated
channel.description:
[b]Note I am Cell From Rune-Server, Mopar knows this is me so therefore if you have any questions PM Me, However i will not help you with the source. PM me for any other questions then that.[/b]
[b]TERMS OF USE, IF YOU USE THIS YOU MUST GIVE CREDITS TO THE CREATORS OF THIS SERVER IF NOT I WILL PERSONALLY ASK MOPAR TO DELETE YOUR THREAD OR ADVERTISEMENT ![/b]
[b][size=24pt]I WILL NOT HELP YOU SET THIS UP, DO NOT PM ME[/size][/b]
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/x0H40Z.png[/img] Back up permission incase link dies. http://i.imgur.com/eHPUS.png
Client [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?zlbom2rqxv94u95]deob 637.zip[/url]
Server [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?q4mwda0naxec3hq]Dementhium 637.zip[/url]
Non Mysql [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?6782dpz4nh7s1bc]Dementhium 637.rar[/url] Adding media in a second
